question: Show me all companies that visited in October
SQL: SELECT DISTINCT c.company_name FROM companies c JOIN jobs j ON c.id = j.company_id WHERE MONTH(j.created_at) = 10

question: How many students are from Electronics department?
SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM students WHERE department = 'Electronics'

question: Find all job positions in Bangalore
SQL: SELECT j.title, c.company_name FROM jobs j JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.id WHERE j.location = 'Bangalore'

question: Show me students who got offers
SQL: SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, c.company_name FROM students s JOIN applications a ON s.id = a.student_id JOIN jobs j ON a.job_id = j.id JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.id WHERE a.status = 'offered'

question: What is the average CGPA of placed students?
SQL: SELECT AVG(s.cgpa) FROM students s JOIN applications a ON s.id = a.student_id WHERE a.status = 'selected'
